name: gel-typography
description: A flexible code implementation of the GEL Typography

scripts.test: npm run test-without-large-fonts && npm run test-with-large-fonts
scripts.test-with-large-fonts: node-sass test/test-with-large-fonts.scss test/test-with-large-fonts.css --output-style=expanded --sourcemap=none && diff -u test/test-with-large-fonts-expected.css test/test-with-large-fonts.css
scripts.dist: node-sass src/gel-typography.scss dist/gel-typography.min.css --output-style=compressed --sourcemap=none && node-sass src/gel-typography.scss dist/gel-typography.css --output-style=expanded --sourcemap=none

author: BBC
